bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of tou chuang 頭瘡 , head sores, with red sores, leaking liquid, itching and loss of hair. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 27: 此由頭瘡，蟲食髪禿落，無白痂，有汁，皮赤而 癢，故謂之赤禿 , “This is because of head sores when bugs/worms eat the hair leading to baldness. There are no white crusts. There is liquid. The skin is red and itches. Hence this is called ‘ red baldness ’”.
